item.title: Episode One - 2 Minute Review
item.description: Catalyst TV - Episode One # Special Group - 2MinReview - with the sequence of 3 proposals benefits for 1 ultimate goal - to help the Vietnamese and global community to understand the insight of the proposals based on their tools. Learn more about their proposal here: F7: Scale-UP Cardano’s Community Hubs # Ideascale Requested funds in USD 12,000 F7: Multilingual resources # Ideascale Requested funds in USD 18480 F7: Improve and Grow Auditability # Ideascale
